comment.author: 29001722@N07
comment._content: According to inscriptions these cannons were originally called "the Wolf" and were manufactured in 1577 and 1579. They were snatched from the russians in 1581 (Narva) and in 1612 (Ivangorod). They were brought to Gripsholm castle in 1623. www.bilderochfakta.se/militar/artilleri/pjaser-ar-1500-15...

comment.author: 14775694@N04
comment._content: The barrels are original russian but the wooden carriges were added later by the Swedes.
